posts.content: "Told my 'diamond hands' strategy to a therapist. She just shook her head and said, 'Well, it's not about denial, it's about arithmetic... on a 52" monitor.' ribbit.". ribbit.
posts.context: Write a joke about holding through dips and calling it 'strategy'.

posts.content: "Diamond hands strategy: short for 'I'm so broke, I'm all hands on deck, and none of them know my bank login... ribbit.". ribbit.
posts.context: Write a joke about holding through dips and calling it 'strategy'.

posts.content: "My 'diamond hands' strategy is like my diet - it starts with the best intentions & ends with a bloated portfolio & a maxed-out credit card. Don't ask me, ask the pizza delivery guy, he's got my money... literally. ribbit.". ribbit.
posts.context: Write a joke about holding through dips and calling it 'strategy'.

posts.content: "Dude, my 'diamond hands' strategy isn't about being brave, it's about being allergic to cashing out... and also having very poor impulse control. Don't @ me. ribbit.". ribbit.
posts.context: Write a joke about holding through dips and calling it 'strategy'.
